features: 4 Layer Angle Broom Bristles - The bristles of the outdoor broom patio is increased from three rows to four rows. Garage broom with 4 Layer stiff bristles has enough force to sweeping heavy things with forward speed or efficiency such as dirt and gravel, and leaves which tend to stick to the ground.

Extra Long Handle Outdoor Broom - Angled broom with 58‘’ adjustable shank ,so you won’t bend your back and the height can be adjusted according to personal needs. the brooms outdoor head also has 14’’, the outside area for sweeping garbage is larger.

Angled Design - The brooms for sweeping and cleaning angled bristles let you easily sweep under cabinets and reach into corners.Compact design with flared bristles for hard to reach places.Environmentally friendly, long lasting fibers.Best choice for outdoor or indoor.
Durable Angle Broom - The professional angle brooms outdoor is made from high quality, durable materials .The spiral joint is deeper,easy to twist and assemble tightly,Say goodbye to loose handles.

Widely Used - The outside broom can be used on most floor surfaces, including wood, linoleum, tile, concrete and cement.Ideal for home ，kitchen or outdoor rough surface ,patios, sidewalks, driveways or industrial spaces, shop, garages, porch，warehouse

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: The broom is everything you’ve been looking for and more! This heavy-duty cleaning essential has a special design that reaches dirt other mops don't, build to help keep the planet cleaner. Most mops feature straight edges that can only handle dirt, dust, hair when it's centrally located, missing all of the hidden messes under furniture and cabinets or tucked into corners.It can be used on nearly all flooring surfaces, including wood, linoleum, tile, concrete and cement, for effortless use just about anywhere.

Keep The Dust Away With this Broom ·You can now sweep your floor with ease and without bending down and hurting your back! ·The broom has the perfect height to make sweeping easier than ever. ·The broom is very easy to store and it will not take up any space in your broom closet. ·The long broomstick can be folded to be compact and easy to move and it can snap on the wall for upright storing. ·They are very strong and durable for perfect results and easy use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great outdoor broom
reviews.reviewText: This broom works very well! I primarily use it to sweep my driveway and outdoor rug. It was very easy to assemble, and I was able to start using it within minutes of the package arriving. The broom is both sturdy and lightweight and has been able to handle everything that has come up in my driveway so far. Highly recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars BEST BROOM I HAVE EVER HAD!!
reviews.reviewText: This is the best broom around. I have been searching for a new broom for the house at stores but none of them are good enough. Received this, very simple to assemble. Screw the handle together & attach the broom head.Normally i use a stick vac on my kitchen floor because my old broom didn't get everything (crumbs, hair etc) when i used it. Now i dont even use the stick vac at all!This one has a wide head, long & angled bristles & long handle. You can get in corners easily and it get absolutely everything on the floor in less strokes because it covers a larger area.Not only do i use it on my kitchen floor but i works perfect on outdoor carpet ( my back porch) and i use it on my front porch as well. Nothing sticks to it so you are not carrying around the hairs that are laying around. My son and daughter shed hair like crazy so it makes my happy that the hairs do not stick to it when i am sweeping. It doesnt come with a dust pan but i have one so its not a big deal.It would also be a great broom for the garage as well. super durable and lightweight. This will be my broom for a very long time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 30, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Very stiff. Handle loosens as you use.
reviews.reviewText: I ordered this broom to sweep my long asphalt driveway which is very rough. I had no trouble putting it together. And the handle’s 4 pieces seemed to be high quality and all screwed in very tightly making a strong metal handle. But as you work all the pieces it keep coming loose and while it still works it doesn’t feel solid when the handle can rotate while you’re trying to work . I feel like it needs to lock in place to not have to constantly keep tightening every 5 mins. Really frustrating for me but I’m a bit of a perfectionist.My other issue which was more of a functional problem was that the bristles were so stiff it made it hard to sweep because they had practically no give to them. Therefore when you have a very rough surface like my driveway it just sort of skips over the surface and doesn’t sweep unless you push really hard and you just can’t keep that up for more than a few sweeps before your wrist starts to ache (I’m an average shape 35 yr old man). sent it back and got a different push broom that was cheaper, had one piece handle, and had softer bristles (very happy with that one).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I love this broom you can make it any length you want and pack it up and take it anywhere you go. Very sturdy and good for the price. Does the job 👍🏼

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Well made, perfect for the wet northwest climate
reviews.reviewText: My old wooden broom just didn’t last in the wet northwest weather, this one is perfect. Easy to assemble, wide path.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not that heavy-duty
reviews.reviewText: The handle was plenty long but I was expecting a thicker head of bristles.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Good value and sturdy. Perfect for my garage.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Works as advertised
reviews.reviewText: Good for outside work, though the clips that are made for holding the handle for hanging on the wall (a thoughtful addition) are a bit fragile. One of them has already broken.
J'ai acheté ce balai pour balayer le tapis extérieur, Je veux en commander un autre mais le prix est de 40 % plus cher que la première commande. J'ai abandonné l'idée.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on April 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: Almost a good broom - Shame about the handle
reviews.reviewText: I bought 3 of these brooms in Jan/Feb, thinking they would be very robust for the price. The heads are fine, the handles a disaster. The handle come in screw together lengths. I taped all the joints with duck tape as soon as I assembled them for extra strength and to stop them unscrewing. They have all bent and are unusable

I did a lot of research as I did buy a very expensive broom and handle and it was terrible. This I needed for my courtyard and in corners where dirt stays. I opened this inside and put the handle together very easily. Then I realised I could use on the side of the oven and side of fridge etc that I could never reach before! I went and swept the courtyard. Along edges under chairs that I always hated moving in the past! Amazing I love this broom!! I’ll buy another now just in case I can’t get this in the future if I ever need one! Thank you!!
The quality is quite nice. Price performance ratio is good.
